phrases: If you are not paying attention, be prepared for a poking attack from my fingers
I am little, but I will squish you; you are as tiny as a flea to me
What I want is a plastic heart (plus, plus, but it is a minus)
But that is boring; when I would notice it, I would have won against you
Love is something that is bittersweet
Simple and clear yet complex and strange stuff
I am only worrying about things that do not matter
You are gentle and sincere yet eccentric
I pretend to be strong all over and compete against you
Just by being honest, it is so stimulating and I feel dizzy
I get hurt, I hurt you, in a preparation of pure feelings
In my head, there is always a pre-parade of pure feelings all by myself
Then let us put salt on
Because I want you to know more about me
More than anyone else, I want to bare my self
But I cannot do it, I have got nothing for experience
But a love that is just sweet
Is slightly different from what I am seeking
If I am told it is white
I would say it is black
I say one thing but do another
If I am told, I love you
I would say, I hate you
I am happy, but what am I saying?
Oohashi High School Cultural Festival (Part One)
Oohashi High School Cultural Festival (Part Two)
Today's the start of September, so why is it so hot this morning?
We had to eat the leftover curry quickly...
Have you done your summer homework?!
What is up with you, Haruta?
Oh, could it be that something happened over summer break?
The summer break is so old!
Second semester is the new cool!
Onwards to the new stage: the cultural festival!
But that is how it is... of course something happened...
I mean, it is your seventeenth summer.
It is completely different for a single woman who has just entered her thirties...
Ah, the world is such a cruel place...
The arbitrary decision is that this year's event will be limited to just one day...
Even with the power of the president...
It is not like this was a one-sided decision forced onto us.
The negotiations with the teaching staff have just begun.
If we manage to pull this off the way we want,
even giving up the second day will have its merits.
No matter what the obstacles, I will make this year's cultural festival extravagant!
this will be my final major school event!
Takasu-kun, shall we go and find a UFO next?
What the hell are you doing, you trash?!
my nails are long at the moment, so I cannot touch the ball.
Ami-chan is an angel after all...
I am a Palmtop Tiger fan.
Whoa, Ami-chan's riding the Tiger like a horse!
Man, I want to be ridden like a horse too...
And what the hell is zentle?
Do not you all want to see the girls you hold dear to your heart in their cute, non-everyday form?
You did not get into anything strange during summer break, did you?
Soon it will be the cultural festival.
our class, 2-C, has to enter talks to decide what we are going to do for this event.
I am on the cultural festival committee!
If we, for example, host a maid cafe during the cultural festival,
it means we will get to see the girls in maid outfits!
If all the guys conspire together and force a decisive vote,
we will have an indisputable majority!
Even if it is coming from Haruta...
If we are going to do that, instead of maids, I definitely...
I already get to see her in something like a maid outfit at her part-time job anyway...
An outfit like a Chinese dress that fits to a body's curves perfectly is more...
If it fits to a body's curves perfectly,
it will mean that I will end up having to make fake breast pads...
Rather than Chinese dresses, I would...
Do not go off on a tangent!
Oh man, what were we talking abou -
Taiga, I am going on ahead.
What now, all of the sudden?
It got torn by Stupid Chi'.
How about not smearing my good name?
You stepped on it, tripped, and ripped it all on your own!
It all happened because the Stupid Chi' dodged the ball in the first place!
Like I said, that was because my nails -
I will stitch up the tear.
Make sure you have it ready by next week.
Do not walk away after putting the blame on someone else!
Now, now, let us return to the classroom as well.
that talk about finding a UFO later...
My, are not instant noodles the enemy of dieting warriors?!
I will have to put another piece of cloth under this.
I guess I will sacrifice one of Yasuko's old thermal shirts.
But it is bothering me, so take the cellphone -
What is it now, all of a sudden?
I am telling you to leave it!
He is the guy who remarried, decided that I was inconvenient,
rented me an apartment, and then threw me out of his house.
He is that cold-hearted of a man.
No matter how he is, your father is your father.
Calling him shitty old man is a bit...
Your family is always somewhere in your heart, even when you are apart.
I am telling you, he is a shitty old man!
You do not have to learn that!
Are you talking about your papa?
In order to protect himself in case he got stabbed -
Doing that is not wonderful at all!
Rather, do not go talking to people about him that way!
We would like to decide on our exhibition and our Miss Oohashi candidate!
Um, for the Miss Oohashi candidate we will go with Ami-chan,
and I do not think anyone has any objections, so our problem is the -
Although I am happy for the thought,
I have been selected as the master of ceremonies for the Miss Oohashi contest.
So, even if you did decide to pick me, I cannot be in the contest.
I mean, Aisaka-san's really tiny and cute,
and she is famous all over school too.
What are you saying, Super Stupid Chi'?!
Why do I have to do something like that?!
But that might actually be rather good.
In truth, the Tiger is famous.
You are a member of this class too.
You have got to actively participate in this kind of event!
If just saying it will not get it through your skull, I will smash the whole festival -
If it is Aisaka, we might even win this.
So, the decision falls in favour of the Tiger being our Miss Oohashi candidate!
Continuing where we left off, I would like to ask what we should have as our exhibition -
Is not that, like, super otaku?
That will most definitely overlap with other classes.
I definitely do not want to do that.
This is kind of my opinion, and it is not like I want to do it, but...
I really hate these kinds of things,
but if everyone has fun, it would be great, or so I thought...
Oh, I am getting a nosebleed.
Do not take this the wrong way, okay?
It is not like I was going to say something weird...
I, um... want a h-haunted house -
I am not letting you, okay?
Make a band and put on a concert?
Man, that is the so lame in Japan these days!
That kind of one-day excitement is nothing but an illusion!
You are going to suck by Christmas anyway!
Either way, we will not get anywhere like this!
Now that it is come to this, we are going to have a final decisive vote!
All of you, get your hands writing what you want to do!
No matter what the girls write, they are merely a big mob.
They are no threat to the Male Alliance.
our class exhibition will be a pro-wres...
Who was it that wrote pro-wrestling show and serious in parentheses?!
Hey, why did not you make it a majority decision?
While she is going through the endless circle of transmigration,
I am going to drop her down to all kinds of Hells!
Give it up and just enjoy a class event for once.
You are being all happy on your own.
Ever since we came back from the trip, you have been -
It is saying that the balance is zero.
It is because I kept ignoring the phone calls...
He will even do things like this...
The ones you have been getting recently?
He is been calling frequently for some time now.
But it annoyed me, so I ignored them.
So now he is emptied the account for my living expenses.
I really want to kill him!
Saying that about your parents is bad, you know.
Just pick it up for starters.
Either way, nothing will happen unless you talk.
And besides, not having any money will be bothersome, no?
Her picking up the phone was great, but...
Anyhow, it seems my daughter is not coming here.
I wanted to see Taiga no matter what,
but it seems I made her hate me more instead.
Now that it is come to this, please order anything you would like.
I am having dinner after this.
Uh, I will help myself, then!
I will have an egg bagel!
and I think I will have a salmon bagel.
Put a ton of cheese in it.
Before I forget it, take this.
I really wanted to see her no matter what.
I had something important to talk with her about, you see...
Um... are you like that with Taiga?
and it is not like we are going out or anything like that.
We just live close to one another,
and so we just got along somehow.
you must have heard a lot about me from Taiga.
My new wife was way too young.
Because of that, Taiga just could not get used to our new life.
And then all kinds of misunderstandings piled up, one after another.
My current wife's name is Yuu.
It got to the point where either Taiga or Yuu had to leave.
I want to live with Taiga.
I wanted to tell her that today.
I no longer have any doubts.
I want to start over with Taiga.
I am going to divorce Yuu soon.
And then I will live together with Taiga.
Because we are father and daughter.
Your dad's saying that he is coming for you!
Rinse them in water for more than five seconds!
In exchange for you going to meet him,
I promised that I would do the dishes, right?
He does not seem like a normal adult or -
Boil some water and prepare some tea or something!
Your old man was really worried about you.
Because of that, he now wants to live with you agai -
Your old man said he wants to live with you.
It is none of your business!
Do not butt into other people's families!
You are the one who made me go!
Is it over now that you got the money from him?!
That is why I am standing here right now doing the dishes.
That is why this is the end.
I will not ever see that guy again.
Do not give me that crap!
Do not touch me so familiarly!
Your old man was depressed because he is being ignored by you!
I am the one you should feel sorry for!
Has it been passed out to everyone?
I really felt responsible for this.
That is why I made this: a pro-wrestling show script.
Hey, maybe we should just drop it?
Drop the class exhibition, and focus on the Miss Oohashi contest.
We cannot go back on this now!
Yuri-chan already stamped and submitted the exhibition activity plan!
This might actually be a lot of fun.
Everyone is got a role properly assigned to them.
That makes me kind of happy.
It is been done really well.
Haruta-kun, let us do our best!
For now, let us start practising!
the students of class 2-C were living happily and peacefully under the class leader, Ami-chan.
But there were some who considered this peace unpleasant!
They were the personification of evil, the Palmtop Tiger,
and her follower, Delinquent Takasu Ryuuji!
Why am I her follower, and on top of that, a delinquent?
Why am I the personification of evil?
The Palmtop Tiger attacks her classmates of 2-C!
The classmates are brainwashed one by one!
But by the desperate persuasion of Ami-chan, the brainwashing gets removed!
In the end, everyone combines their powers,
and successfully drive away the Palmtop Tiger and Delinquent Takasu Ryuuji!
And with that, they lived happily ever after!
You ask us to hear you out and then we get that?
But it is simple, yet dramatic.
There is no way I am doing something like that!
Sheesh, Aisaka-san is as selfish as ever.
First the Miss Oohashi contest, and now this!
Why are you only making me do weird things!
If hitting me will end it, hit me as much as you please!
But nothing good will come from doing so!
Oh, the Palmtop Tiger's really into it.
Wait, what the hell is that?!
Haruta-kun said he was giving me an especially nice role.
A decision was just made by the school!
This year's cultural festival will be a competition between all classes.
The class who places first will receive extravagant prizes!
And while I am at it, these are the prizes!
One: for the rest of this year, a refrigerator will be set up for your class!
Do not you... want to cool your juice?
One: your class will be getting next year's new state-of-the-art humidifying air conditioner installed!
The current restrictions on the use of electrical outlets in the bathrooms will be lifted!
Do not you want to... curl your hair?
And finally: discount coupons at Super Kanoya!
Do not you want... discount coupons?
Hey boys, get your act together, okay?!
Hey, what should we get for dinner?
What should we do with the amberjack?
Let go of me, stupid dog!
Here I thought that at least you would be on my side!
I am saying this because I am on your side!
I am saying this for your sake!
Do not you see he has come for you?!
You should at least hear what he has to say!
Do not you go spewing bullshit!
Were not you crying because you had been abandoned?!
You actually want to return home, right?!
How can someone like you understand anything about me?
I do not need that guy anymore.
He was useless trash I had no use for, so I abandoned him!
My old man will not come home no matter how much I want it!
I am not doing this for Taiga's sake.
It is a good thing, right?
I will think of it like that.
I do not know if I can think of it like that or not, but...
But since you are saying so...
I will think of it like that.
Koigakubo Yuri entered her thirties this summer.
